languages.text: [Поднять оружие для удара] "Подойди поближе, и я скажу свой ответ".
[Raise your weapon to strike] "Come closer and I shall tell you my answer."
languages.original_text: [Поднять оружие для удара] "Подойди поближе, и я скажу свой ответ".

traits.locale_text: [Raise your weapon to strike] "Come closer and I shall tell you my answer."
[Raise your weapon to strike] "Come closer and I shall tell you my answer."
[Raise your weapon to strike] "Come closer and I shall tell you my answer."
[Raise your weapon to strike] "Come closer and I shall tell you my answer."

languages.text: [举起武器，准备攻击]“靠过来点，我就告诉你答案。”
languages.original_text: [Raise your weapon to strike] "Come closer and I shall tell you my answer."

traits.locale_text: [举起武器，准备攻击]“靠过来点，我就告诉你答案。”

languages.text: [Levantar tu arma para atacar] «Acérquese y le daré mi respuesta».
languages.original_text: [Raise your weapon to strike] "Come closer and I shall tell you my answer."

traits.locale_text: [Levantar tu arma para atacar] «Acérquese y le daré mi respuesta».

languages.text: [武器を構えて撃とうとする]「それ以上近寄ってみろ、答えを聞かせてやる」
languages.original_text: [Raise your weapon to strike] "Come closer and I shall tell you my answer."

traits.locale_text: [武器を構えて撃とうとする]「それ以上近寄ってみろ、答えを聞かせてやる」

languages.text: [Deine Waffe zum Schlag erheben] "Kommt näher, und Ihr erhaltet meine Antwort."
languages.original_text: [Raise your weapon to strike] "Come closer and I shall tell you my answer."

traits.locale_text: [Deine Waffe zum Schlag erheben] "Kommt näher, und Ihr erhaltet meine Antwort."

languages.text: [Lever votre arme pour frapper] « Approchez donc, que je vous donne ma réponse. »
languages.original_text: [Raise your weapon to strike] "Come closer and I shall tell you my answer."

traits.locale_text: [Lever votre arme pour frapper] « Approchez donc, que je vous donne ma réponse. »

languages.text: [Saldırmak için silahını çek] "Yanıma yaklaşın da size yanıtımı ileteyim."
languages.original_text: [Raise your weapon to strike] "Come closer and I shall tell you my answer."

traits.locale_text: [Saldırmak için silahını çek] "Yanıma yaklaşın da size yanıtımı ileteyim."
